resources.string: LifeTrak
We cannot connect to your LifeTrak watch

1. Make sure Bluetooth is turned on, on your smartphone or tablet.
2. Check that Bluetooth is active on your LifeTrak device. If it is not, press and hold the lower right button to turn it on (R450) or activate pairing/syncing (C300, C320, C410, C410w, R420).
3. Make sure that your R450 watch is unpaired to any other devices
4. Make sure the device youâ€™re using is not paired to any LifeTrak watch.

Time duration should not be greater than the time on start time and end time
